description: After Henriette Sontag (1806–1854), German soprano singer.

entries.meaning: (dated) A knitted worsted jacket, worn over the waist of a woman's dress.
examples: If it had, only think what a scattering of clothing there would have been—skirts, dresses, sontags, double-dresses, shawls, cloaks, hoods, scarfs, veils, and little black strings […]
